  or Agricultural Science or   four (4) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in relevant subject as above at the final 
examination of National Business and Technical 
Examination Board recognised Preliminary ND 
programme offered in Polytechnics or similar 
Post Secondary Technical Institutions.  
d) RUGIPO requires ‘O’ level credit pass in Physics 
or Chemistry and ‘O’ level pass in English 
Language.  
e) KWAPOLY accepts ‘O’ level credit pass in  
 Government  but  does  not  accept  Basic  
Electricity.  
f) FEDPO-EDE requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Physics and any two (2) subjects from the 
following: Technical Drawing, Geography, 
Economics, ICT/ Computer Studies,  
Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry.  
g) IBD POLY accepts Physics as UTME subject.  
h) FEDPO-ILA requires any three (3) of Physics, 
Economics, Geography and Mathematics as 
UTME subjects.  
i) FEDPO-NEK accepts Physics and Technical 
Drawing as UTME subjects.  
j) FEDPO-FFA accepts Geography or Economics 
as UTME subject.  
k) FEDPO-MUB accepts certificate in Surveying and 
Geo-Informatics plus O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, Physics, English Language and two 
(2) other subjects from Further Mathematics, 
Statistics, Chemistry or Geography.  
l) SARO-WIWA POLY accepts any th ree (3) of 
Chemistry/Physics, Biology, Economics and 
Mathematics as UTME subjects.  
m) FEDPO-BAU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Physics, Mathematics, Geography and  
Chemistry as course requirement. Also requires 
Physics, Mathematics and any one (1) of 
Chemistry, Art, Biology or Economics as UTME 
subjects.  
n) KADPOLY requires Mathematics, Physics and 
any one (1) from Geography, Chemistry,
